name: Porta War
description:
April 1, 1991

A group of rogue handheld devices have broken from the order.  They are determined to destroy us!  Your mission is to defeat them...by any means necessary!

5 exciting levels!

Choose between 4 unique ships!

Can you destroy the final boss???

Controls:

KeyboardGamepadTouchMovement [WASD] / [arrows] d-pad / left analog Touch/DragShoot [SPACE] / [CTRL]
buttons 0 and 2autoOptions[ESC] / [P]startupper right button
